How this site is made

This site is built with minimal bells and whistles while looking spiffy and modern. It is

  • Fully mobile responsive

  • Lightweight. No libraries. No frameworks.

  • Built using vanilla HTML5 CSS3 Javascript

  • Offline enabled! (using Service Worker )

The source code for this website is available at the github page. Feel free to make a pull request or customize it for your own use.
